intro: This document serves as a comprehensive land cover and land use (LC/LU) nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's Riparian Zones (RZ) product. It provides detailed descriptions of all LC/LU classes, outlining their geographic characteristics, specifying available input datasets, and detailing relevant methods for interpreting each class. The guideline aims to ensure consistent and accurate mapping of riparian zones along selected rivers within the EEA-38 + UK region, supporting environmental monitoring and policy initiatives.
keywords: Mapping and Assessment of Ecosystems and their Services (MAES)
